Should all bitcoin owners hold their keys, run their nodes, mix their coins?  If you have half a brain you know that’s impossible. How to reconcile this:  You can have 1mil people who USE bitcoin for its properties, but 1 billion people speculating on the growth of that usecase.

If you own Bitcoins, you must transfer them to an exchange. If you don't do that, Bitcoin will collapse. Exchanges use the holdings of their users to support Tether, which in turn supports Bitcoin. If exchanges run out of user funds, the ecosystem will go bust. Bitcoin needs you!
